items.content_html:
Does micro.blog do bold and italics, when highlighted with Markdown. Yes!

How about links: my home page

I’m liking it. Lots of features. Really easy. Just works. Waiting to see how often they sync with GitHub.
items.content_text:
Does micro.blog do __bold__ and _italics_, when highlighted with Markdown. Yes!

How about links: [my home page](http://billstclair.com)

I'm liking it. Lots of features. Really easy. Just works. Waiting to see how often they sync with GitHub.

items.title: Hello, micro.blog
items.content_html:
Just got my 30-day free micro.blog trial.

This is The Holistic Connection, an hour ago. Yummy chocolate oat-milk ice cream. A little melted, but held together well by locust bean and guar gum. Still cold in the center.
